actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for an increase in the amount of the personal exemptions for taxable years beginning after December 31, 1974.

summary.text: Increases to $1,000 (presently $750) the amount of the personal exemption under the Internal Revenue Code for taxable years beginning after December 31, 1974.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for an increase in the amount of the personal exemptions for taxable years beginning after December 31, 1974.
